description: Runtime obsoletions, analyzers, and experimental APIs

diagnostics.name: SystemTextEncodingUTF7
diagnostics.message: The UTF-7 encoding is insecure and should not be used. Consider using UTF-8 instead.

diagnostics.name: PrincipalPermissionAttribute
diagnostics.message: PrincipalPermissionAttribute is not honored by the runtime and must not be used.

diagnostics.name: CodeAccessSecurity
diagnostics.message: Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.

diagnostics.name: ConstrainedExecutionRegion
diagnostics.message: The Constrained Execution Region (CER) feature is not supported.

diagnostics.name: GlobalAssemblyCache
diagnostics.message: The Global Assembly Cache is not supported.

diagnostics.name: ThreadAbort
diagnostics.message: Thread.Abort is not supported and throws PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: DefaultCryptoAlgorithms
diagnostics.message: The default implementation of this cryptography algorithm is not supported.

diagnostics.name: CreatePdbGenerator
diagnostics.message: The CreatePdbGenerator API is not supported and throws PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: AuthenticationManager
diagnostics.message: AuthenticationManager is not supported. Methods will no-op or throw PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: RemotingApis
diagnostics.message: This Remoting API is not supported and throws PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: BinaryFormatter
diagnostics.message: `BinaryFormatter` serialization is obsolete and should not be used. See https://aka.ms/binaryformatter for recommended alternatives.

diagnostics.name: CodeBase
diagnostics.message: Assembly.CodeBase and Assembly.EscapedCodeBase are only included for .NET Framework compatibility. Use Assembly.Location instead.

diagnostics.name: EscapeUriString
diagnostics.message: Uri.EscapeUriString can corrupt the Uri string in some cases. Consider using Uri.EscapeDataString for query string components instead.

diagnostics.name: WebRequest
diagnostics.message: WebRequest, HttpWebRequest, ServicePoint, and WebClient are obsolete. Use HttpClient instead.

diagnostics.name: DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute
diagnostics.message: DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute has no effect in .NET 6.0+.

diagnostics.name: GetContextInfo
diagnostics.message: Use the Graphics.GetContextInfo overloads that accept arguments for better performance and fewer allocations.

diagnostics.name: StrongNameKeyPair
diagnostics.message: Strong name signing is not supported and throws PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: ReflectionOnlyLoading
diagnostics.message: ReflectionOnly loading is not supported and throws PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: RuntimeEnvironment
diagnostics.message: RuntimeEnvironment members SystemConfigurationFile, GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr, and GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject are not supported and throw PlatformNotSupportedException.

diagnostics.name: JsonSerializerOptionsIgnoreNullValues
diagnostics.message: JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreNullValues is obsolete. To ignore null values when serializing, set DefaultIgnoreCondition to JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull.

diagnostics.name: DerivedCryptographicTypes
diagnostics.message: Derived cryptographic types are obsolete. Use the Create method on the base type instead.

diagnostics.name: Rijndael
diagnostics.message: The Rijndael and RijndaelManaged types are obsolete. Use Aes instead.

diagnostics.name: RNGCryptoServiceProvider
diagnostics.message: RNGCryptoServiceProvider is obsolete. To generate a random number, use one of the RandomNumberGenerator static methods instead.

diagnostics.name: AppDomainCreateUnload
diagnostics.message: Creating and unloading AppDomains is not supported and throws an exception.

diagnostics.name: SuppressIldasmAttribute
diagnostics.message: SuppressIldasmAttribute has no effect in .NET 6.0+.

diagnostics.name: X509CertificateImmutable
diagnostics.message: X509Certificate and X509Certificate2 are immutable. Use X509CertificateLoader to create a new certificate.

diagnostics.name: PublicKeyProperty
diagnostics.message: PublicKey.Key is obsolete. Use the appropriate method to get the public key, such as GetRSAPublicKey.

diagnostics.name: X509CertificatePrivateKey
diagnostics.message: X509Certificate2.PrivateKey is obsolete. Use the appropriate method to get the private key, such as GetRSAPrivateKey, or use the CopyWithPrivateKey method to create a new instance with a private key.

diagnostics.name: ProduceLegacyHmacValues
diagnostics.message: ProduceLegacyHmacValues is obsolete. Producing legacy HMAC values is not supported.

diagnostics.name: UseManagedSha1
diagnostics.message: HMACSHA1 always uses the algorithm implementation provided by the platform. Use a constructor without the useManagedSha1 parameter.

diagnostics.name: CryptoConfigEncodeOID
diagnostics.message: EncodeOID is obsolete. Use the ASN.1 functionality provided in System.Formats.Asn1.

diagnostics.name: CorruptedStateRecovery
diagnostics.message: Recovery from corrupted process state exceptions is not supported; HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute is ignored.

diagnostics.name: Rfc2898CryptDeriveKey
diagnostics.message: Rfc2898DeriveBytes.CryptDeriveKey is obsolete and is not supported. Use PasswordDeriveBytes.CryptDeriveKey instead.

diagnostics.name: CmsSignerCspParamsCtor
diagnostics.message: CmsSigner(CspParameters) is obsolete and is not supported. Use an alternative constructor instead.

diagnostics.name: SignerInfoCounterSig
diagnostics.message: ComputeCounterSignature without specifying a CmsSigner is obsolete and is not supported. Use the overload that accepts a CmsSigner.

diagnostics.name: RegexCompileToAssembly
diagnostics.message: Regex.CompileToAssembly is obsolete and not supported. Use the GeneratedRegexAttribute with the regular expression source generator instead.

diagnostics.name: AssemblyNameMembers
diagnostics.message: AssemblyName members HashAlgorithm, ProcessorArchitecture, and VersionCompatibility are obsolete and not supported.

diagnostics.name: SystemDataSerializationFormatBinary
diagnostics.message: SerializationFormat.Binary is obsolete and should not be used. See https://aka.ms/serializationformat-binary-obsolete for more information.

diagnostics.name: TlsVersion10and11
diagnostics.message: TLS versions 1.0 and 1.1 have known vulnerabilities and are not recommended. Use a newer TLS version instead, or use SslProtocols.None to defer to OS defaults.

diagnostics.name: EncryptionPolicy
diagnostics.message: EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption and AllowEncryption significantly reduce security and should not be used in production code.
The default hash algorithm and iteration counts in Rfc2898DeriveBytes constructors are outdated and insecure. Use a constructor that accepts the hash algorithm and the number of iterations.

diagnostics.name: EccXmlExportImport
diagnostics.message: ToXmlString and FromXmlString have no implementation for ECC types, and are obsolete. Use a standard import and export format such as ExportSubjectPublicKeyInfo or ImportSubjectPublicKeyInfo for public keys and ExportPkcs8PrivateKey or ImportPkcs8PrivateKey for private keys.

diagnostics.name: EcDhPublicKeyBlob
diagnostics.message: ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey.ToByteArray() and the associated constructor do not have a consistent and interoperable implementation on all platforms. Use ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey.ExportSubjectPublicKeyInfo() instead.

diagnostics.name: AssemblyNameCodeBase
diagnostics.message: AssemblyName.CodeBase and AssemblyName.EscapedCodeBase are obsolete. Using them for loading an assembly is not supported.

diagnostics.name: CryptoStringFactory
diagnostics.message: Cryptographic factory methods accepting an algorithm name are obsolete. Use the parameterless Create factory method on the algorithm type instead.

diagnostics.name: ControlledExecutionRun
diagnostics.message: ControlledExecution.Run method may corrupt the process and should not be used in production code.

diagnostics.name: XmlSecureResolver
diagnostics.message: XmlSecureResolver is obsolete. Use XmlResolver.ThrowingResolver instead when attempting to forbid XML external entity resolution.

diagnostics.name: RsaEncryptDecrypt
diagnostics.message: RSA.EncryptValue and DecryptValue are not supported and throw NotSupportedException. Use RSA.Encrypt and RSA.Decrypt instead.

diagnostics.name: JsonSerializerOptionsAddContext
diagnostics.message: JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext is obsolete. To register a JsonSerializerContext, use either the TypeInfoResolver or TypeInfoResolverChain properties.

diagnostics.name: LegacyFormatter
diagnostics.message: Formatter-based serialization is obsolete and should not be used.

diagnostics.name: LegacyFormatterImpl
diagnostics.message: This API supports obsolete formatter-based serialization. It should not be called or extended by application code.

diagnostics.name: RegexExtensibility
diagnostics.message: This API supports obsolete mechanisms for Regex extensibility. It is not supported.

diagnostics.name: AesGcmTagConstructor
diagnostics.message: AesGcm should indicate the required tag size for encryption and decryption. Use a constructor that accepts the tag size.

diagnostics.name: ThreadVolatileReadWrite
diagnostics.message: Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite are obsolete. Use Volatile.Read or Volatile.Write respectively instead.

diagnostics.name: ArmIntrinsicPerformsUnsignedOperation
diagnostics.message: The underlying hardware instruction does not perform a signed saturate narrowing operation, and it always returns an unsigned result. Use the unsigned overload instead.

diagnostics.name: LoadFromHashAlgorithm
diagnostics.message: LoadFrom with a custom AssemblyHashAlgorithm is obsolete. Use overloads without an AssemblyHashAlgorithm.

diagnostics.name: X509CtorCertDataObsolete
diagnostics.message: Loading certificate data through the constructor or Import is obsolete. Use X509CertificateLoader instead to load certificates.

diagnostics.name: TlsCipherAlgorithmEnums
diagnostics.message: KeyExchangeAlgorithm, KeyExchangeStrength, CipherAlgorithm, CipherStrength, HashAlgorithm and HashStrength properties of SslStream are obsolete. Use NegotiatedCipherSuite instead.

diagnostics.name: SystemEventsEventsThreadShutdown
diagnostics.message: SystemEvents.EventsThreadShutdown callbacks are not run before the process exits. Use AppDomain.ProcessExit instead.

diagnostics.name: Rfc2898DeriveBytesCtor
diagnostics.message: The constructors on Rfc2898DeriveBytes are obsolete. Use the static Pbkdf2 method instead.

diagnostics.name: QueryableMinByMaxByTSourceObsolete
diagnostics.message: The Queryable MinBy and MaxBy taking an IComparer\<TSource\> are obsolete. Use the new ones that take an IComparer\<TKey\>.

diagnostics.name: XsltSettingsEnableScript
diagnostics.message: XSLT Script blocks are not supported.

diagnostics.name: NamedPipeClientStreamIsConnected
diagnostics.message: This constructor has been deprecated and argument bool isConnected does not have any effect. Use NamedPipeClientStream(PipeDirection direction, bool isAsync, SafePipeHandle safePipeHandle) instead.

This type implements at least one type with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' attribute. Add the 'GeneratedComClassAttribute' to enable passing this type to COM and exposing the COM interfaces for the types with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' from objects of this type.
.NET COM hosting with 'EnableComHosting' only supports built-in COM interop. It does not support source-generated COM interop with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'.
